review: Haven't used it yet, but both son & daughter love theirs
author: Ja Nell

review: Even though I like the fire tv stick, it is not without some difficulties. Sometimes I can't stream something because it's says my connection is weak, which is not true for anything else I stream! Sometimes when you pause a show, when you get back to it, you have to start all over again to get back to it. I'm still working with this and hoping I can get better at using it, and hoping it works better along the way! But I really think it has some bugs, that's why I gave it 4 stars.
author: MMCher "M"

review: Easy setup. Very intuitive. Great product.
